display_long_description:
Climb Up is an exciting and immersive VR physics-based climbing adventure that challenges your strength, strategy, and creativity. Get ready to scale unique and dynamic obstacles in thrilling environments, where each level offers a completely different climbing experience. From realistic, gravity-defying structures to space-like zero-gravity challenges, this game brings a fresh twist to climbing gameplay.

Feel the rush as you use your own hands to navigate through complex barriers, from standard ledges and walls to the innovative use of hand hooks that push your climbing skills to the next level. Test your limits in a high-risk construction site, where every move counts. Prepare for the ultimate test as you climb in zero gravity, where your every action takes on a whole new dimension.

With physics-driven mechanics, each movement is as realistic as it is exciting. Whether you're reaching for the next ledge or swinging past obstacles, the immersive gameplay will keep you hooked for hours.

Ready to climb higher? Climb Up offers a truly unique VR experience you won’t want to miss!




New update 
[media]
Paddle your way upstream through challenging rapids and obstacles. Master your oar, fight the current, and climb the river to victory in this immersive VR adventure
